column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Law clerk says : " This trial will now come to order !
#Text=I should have paid him !
#Text=" Asami says : " Yeah , you think ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I was asleep in my chambers when the rebels attacked .
#Text=They overpowered me , and the next thing I remember was waking up in the snow after Avatar Korra had saved me .
#Text=" Hotah says : " According to Unalaq 's testimony , you attended a meeting where Varrick tried to incite a civil war .
#Text=Is that true ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes .
#Text=" Hotah says : " And where these men present at that meeting ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Well , yes , but - " Hotah says : " And where exactly did this meeting take place ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Objection !
#Text=" Hotah says : " Quiet down out there !
#Text=I 'll ask you one more time .
#Text=Where did the meeting happen ?
#Text=" Korra says : " My parents ' house .
#Text=" Hotah says : " And who led this meeting ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Your honor , if I may ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " May what ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " May I ... declare a mistrial ?
#Text=" Hotah says : " Sit down !
#Text=Varrick and your father led the meeting , did n't they ?
#Text=" Korra says : " My parents are innocent !
#Text=" Hotah says : " I 've heard all I need to .
#Text=I 'll return shortly with my decision .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Hey there , Eska , I was wondering if we could talk .
#Text=" Eska says : " I grant you permission to speak freely .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , good , because I just need to be honest with you .
#Text=You know , when we first met , there was this crazy spark .
#Text=But I 'm starting to feel like that spark is fading .
#Text=" Eska says : " I agree .
#Text=It is as if a great chasm has formed between us and nothing can bridge it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh !
#Text=Oh , yes !
#Text=I 'm so glad you understand !
#Text=" Eska says : " Nothing , that is , except marriage .
#Text=We will wed at sunset .
#Text=You may express your joy through tears .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , no , I ca n't - This is really tight .
#Text="
